channel.title: [667/718] Drop Editor Help
channel.description:
I have all the files in the correct areas but I'm getting this error: [code]starting... Error: Could not find or load main class com.rs.tools.dropEditor Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
Any help? Another thing is that when I added the itemdefinitions.java to my server and compiled, I got errors for that file. 7 to be exact. I don't know if that has anything to do with it but I really need to get this working to be able to edit my server.
Will +rep for any help regarding this issue.

item.title: [667/718] Drop Editor Help
item.dc:creator: @hunkr hunkr
item.description:
@hunkr wrote:

[quote=“Techkid, post:3, topic:481318”][quote author=magieman435 link=topic=599557.msg4213084#msg4213084 date=1359854071]
I have all the files in the correct areas but I’m getting this error:

starting... Error: Could not find or load main class com.rs.tools.dropEditor Press any key to continue . . .

Any help? Another thing is that when I added the itemdefinitions.java to my server and compiled, I got errors for that file. 7 to be exact. I don’t know if that has anything to do with it but I really need to get this working to be able to edit my server.

Will +rep for any help regarding this issue.
[/quote]
If its not locating your dropeditor you need to edit the cmd and make sure the directory is setup corretly… Happens on almost all server because of jdk updates or different java versions for everyone[/quote]

You can add me on Skype just to look my prob ?
my Skype is Lawljim

Read full topic
